item.title: Help with loop
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Loops…

case 1278: if(playerHasItem(1351) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1351) { working = !working; while(!working) { startAnimation(879); addItem(1511, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 8); sendMessage("You get some logs."); resetAnimation(); actionTimer = 100; actionTimer =- playerLevel[8]; treetimer ++; break; // Break the loop } } else { sendMessage("You need an axe to cut this tree!"); sendMessage("Try ::axeplz"); } else { if (treetimer >= 5){ ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 1342, -1, 10); treetimer = 0; } } break;
Why doesn’t the loop work?

Read full topic
